article_title: Crews Battle Tank Battery Fire Near Perry - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
An oil field fire struck two miles west of Perry off of John Wayne Rd. Monday afternoon.

Thick black smoke filled the sky as crews battled a tank battery farm fire west of I-35 Monday afternoon.

The fire struck eight tanks two miles west of Perry off of John Wayne Rd.

The fire was contained after 5:30 p.m. once crews used foam to put the fire out.

No injuries were reported.
